The requirement of a BA in Music or related field and the emphasis on a "strong background in music theory" may discourage candidates from lower socio-economic backgrounds or those with non-traditional educational paths from applying. text:
Company: Ward-Flynn

Job Type: Musician

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Musician to join our team at Ward-Flynn. As a Musician, you will be responsible for performing at various events, creating original compositions, and collaborating with other artists. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in music theory and a proven track record of success in the industry.

Responsibilities:
- Perform at events, concerts, and festivals
- Create original compositions for various projects
- Collaborate with other artists and musicians
- Participate in recording sessions and music production

Qualifications and Experience:
- BA in Music or related field required
- 5+ years of experience as a professional musician
- Must have a strong understanding of music theory and composition
- Must be a team player and have excellent communication skills

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a competitive salary ranging from $60,000 to $80,000 USD, based on your experience and skills. Our benefits package includes health, dental, and vision insurance, as well as a 401(k) plan with a company match.
